data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Chirang, Assam, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chirang, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Chirang hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 482,200 citizens of Chirang, Assam, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Chirang, Assam, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chirang, Assam, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Chirang.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.section_summary:
the county of Chirang, Assam, India has a population of 482,200.

We estimate Chirang has 5,304 people who might know Jesus, 5,851 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 471,045 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 476,896 lost in Chirang that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
